channel.title: A little tip for any1 getting choppy FPS.
channel.description:
It helped for me, I went into my task manager and switched HL2.exe to Above Normal or High priority.
Oh btw its a lil off topic but why wasn't Barney in the beggining when you get off the tram? Or am I remembering HL1 wrong?

item.title: A little tip for any1 getting choppy FPS.
item.dc:creator: Nobuga
item.description:
I want the Barney model.
/thread

Read full topic
item.source: A little tip for any1 getting choppy FPS.

item.title: A little tip for any1 getting choppy FPS.
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

Because they wanted to avoid possible story conflicts with Blue Shift and future Half-Life canon.

But officially, the Devs label him as “Barney”. Besides, you can’t see his face anyway so making a new model would have been a waste of time.

Yeah, waste of resources and time I guess, but it would have been nice to see a “Barney” just for the nostalgia factor. He’s probably the second most iconic character figure (mmm… the Gman?) in the Half-Life universe, with Freeman, of course, being number one.

Read full topic
item.source: A little tip for any1 getting choppy FPS.

item.title: A little tip for any1 getting choppy FPS.
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

Because that’s not Barney. That never was.

Barney is the guy banging on the door at the start of Inbound. But even that isn’t completely canonical

I looked at the guard banging on the door during BM Inbound, using the “noclip” cheat. It wasn’t Barney either.

Read full topic
